title: 820-2879 Random shutdown
message:
Computer shuts down from cold boot after about a minute of running. This seems to happen in shorter periods of time once the first initial crash happens if i keep rebooting. I have changed RAM and tried different slots. Also unplugged all peripheral besides LCD. No Liquid. Is this a known issue?

Thanks. Have a good one.

title: 820-2879 Random shutdown
message: Not really common, but I have seen these with ripped up traces under the CPU right where the chassis screw is. Also common is the airport connector cable shorting out the pins on the connector if the piece of tape is missing. Also must use PC8500 RAM. If it is not any of this I doubt this is worth wasting time on.
